remarks: The cardinality of a finite set of sequential integers.  (See ~ frec2uz0d for a description of the hypothesis.)  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 18-May-2020.)
statement:
frecfzennn.1 $e |- G = frec ( ( x e. ZZ |-> ( x + 1 ) ) , 0 ) $.
frecfzennn $p |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( 1 ... N ) ~~ ( `' G ` N ) ) $.
